```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(lme4)
library(tidyr)
library(lavaan)
library(lavaanPlot)
library(DiagrammeRsvg)
library(rsvg)
library(qgraph)
```

```{r}
dataset_wide <- read_csv("../outputs/dataset_SGM_wide_3tp.csv")
```

# Create ever variables
```{r}
# LGBT_inclusive: ever baseline or 1y
dataset_wide <- create_ever_var(data = dataset_wide, search_term = "LGBT_inclusive_bl|LGBT_inclusive_1", new_col_name = "LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp")
```

# Mediation
```{r}
# check correlation
cor_auto(dataset_wide %>% dplyr::select(dim_yesno_q3_1, reshist_state_so_factor)) # not high # no correlation in mediation
```

```{r}
set.seed(060822)
mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long <- '
dim_yesno_q3_1 ~ a1*LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp + scale(age_year_2) + sex_br + race_black + race_white + ethnicity_hisp + scale(household_income_2)
reshist_state_so_factor ~ a2*LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp + scale(age_year_2) + sex_br + race_black + race_white + ethnicity_hisp + scale(household_income_2)
bpm_y_scr_totalprob_t_2 ~ b1*dim_yesno_q3_1 + b2*reshist_state_so_factor + c*LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp + scale(age_year_2) + sex_br + race_black + race_white + ethnicity_hisp + scale(household_income_2)
indirecteffectdiscrim := a1*b1
indirecteffectstate := a2*b2
totaleffect := c + a1*b1 + a2*b2
'

med_mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long <- sem(mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long, data = dataset_wide, se = "bootstrap", bootstrap = 500)

standardizedSolution(med_mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long, type = "std.lv")

plot_mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long <- lavaanPlot(
  model = med_mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long,
  node_options = list(
    shape = "box",
    fontname = "Arial",
    color = "blue4"
  ),
  edge_options = list(color = "darkolivegreen"),
  coefs = TRUE,
  digits = 3,
  stars = "regress"
)

save_png(plot_mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long, "../plots/mediation_BPM.png" )

summary(med_mod_bpm_y_2Ms_long) # Get number of participants used in the models
```

```{r}
set.seed(060822)
mod_SI_2Ms_long <- '
dim_yesno_q3_1 ~ a1*LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp + scale(age_year_2) + sex_br + race_black + race_white + ethnicity_hisp  + scale(household_income_2)
reshist_state_so_factor ~ a2*LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp + scale(age_year_2) + sex_br + race_black + race_white + ethnicity_hisp  + scale(household_income_2)
SI_y_2 ~ b1*dim_yesno_q3_1 + b2*reshist_state_so_factor + c*LGBT_inclusive_ever_2tp + scale(age_year_2) + sex_br + race_black + race_white + ethnicity_hisp  + scale(household_income_2)
indirecteffectdiscrim := a1*b1
indirecteffectstate := a2*b2
totaleffect := c + a1*b1 + a2*b2
'

med_mod_SI_2Ms_long <- sem(mod_SI_2Ms_long, data = dataset_wide, se = "bootstrap", bootstrap = 500)

standardizedSolution(med_mod_SI_2Ms_long, type = "std.all") %>% htmlTable::htmlTable()

plot_mod_SI_2Ms_long <- lavaanPlot(
  model = med_mod_SI_2Ms_long,
  node_options = list(
    shape = "box",
    fontname = "Arial",
    color = "blue4"
  ),
  edge_options = list(color = "darkolivegreen"),
  coefs = TRUE,
  stand = TRUE,
  digits = 3,
  stars = "regress"
)

save_png(plot_mod_SI_2Ms_long, "../plots/mediation_SI.png" )

summary(med_mod_SI_2Ms_long)
```
